title.rendered: Intellectsoft and 1World Online to Establish the First of its Kind Media Token Economy

content.rendered:
Intellectsoft and 1World Online, a blockchain-based platform for publishers and brands with 12 million users, announced a strategic partnership. 1World Online provides publishers and brands with effective tools for engagement and monetization in one blockchain platform, including engagement apps, unique content, ongoing market research, online advertising and promotion capabilities, as well as insightful user analytics. Using our extensive blockchain expertise, Intellectsoft will ensure the company’s blockchain platform has the highest level of security and automation at all times by consistently implementing new blockchain technologies and development practices. We will also help 1World Online in its goal of solidifying as a first of its kind blockchain based media token economy.

“We are excited to work with 1World Online on the development of the next generation of their product. Their interactive media platform with wide deployment and the unprecedented robust token economy is one of the most interesting industry cases and we see multiple possible applications of our extensive expertise in AI, machine learning, and Distributed Ledger Technologies. We believe that together we will set up a new standard for the nascent blockchain industry,” said Michael Minkevich, Intellectsoft’s Board Director, and the recently appointed CEO.

“1World is moving to the next stage in its life-cycle, post our successful ICO in 2017, and enabling more sophisticated blockchain implementation for the token economy is our top priority. With their world-class team, knowledge, and expertise in the blockchain space, Intellectsoft is an invaluable partner in accomplishing this goal. We are looking forward to building the world’s leading solution together,” said Alex Fedosseev, 1World Online Founder and CEO.

Responsible for R&D, the Intellectsoft Blockchain Lab will bring the latest trends, tools, and platforms from the blockchain and cryptocurrency world to the advantage of 1World Online.

The newly established partnership will see Intellectsoft employing the full range of our blockchain capabilities, including design and implementation of full-fledged decentralized applications, building and deploying big-scale blockchain-based solution, smart contract code development, custom token development, and other.  

Learn more about the Intellectsoft Blockchain Lab.

excerpt.rendered: The underlying blockchain platform already has 12 million users.
